item.title: Serverless: Building a mini producer/consumer data pipeline with AWS SNS
item.description: I wanted to create a little data pipeline with Serverless whose main use would be to run once a day, call an API, and load that data into a database. Itâ€™s mostly used to pull in recent data from that API, but I also wanted to be able to invoke it manually and specify a date range. I created the following pair of lambdas that communicate with each other via an SNS topic.
